Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment occurrences across all cases
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' activities

Name: Percentage of variants that include SW-Awaiting AE Assignment immediately after SW-Checklist Completed
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' out of all 'SW-Checklist Completed'

Name: Number of times SW-Awaiting AE Assignment is followed by SW-Initial Reviewer Selection
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment occurrences that eventually lead to SW-EIC Reject
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' out of all 'SW-EIC Reject'

Name: Frequency of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment compared to the frequency of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases where SW-Awaiting AE Assignment appears exactly once per case
Metric: the average of the function base == 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment'

Name: Number of variants in which SW-Awaiting AE Assignment occurs before any reviewer-related activity (e.g., SW-Reviewer Agreed, SW-Reviewer Declined)
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment occurrences that are not preceded by Immediate Reject Decision from the Checklist
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' out of all cases where 'Immediate Reject Decision from the Checklist' does not happen

Name: Frequency of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment in cases that ultimately result in an acceptance (e.g., SW-EIC Accept or RW-EIC Accept)
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' activities for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Accept' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment occurrences that occur within 24 hours of SW-Checklist Completed
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' out of all 'SW-Checklist Completed'

Name: Ratio of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment to Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation across the entire log
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' activities for cases where activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' occurs

Name: Number of times SW-Awaiting AE Assignment is directly followed by SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' activities for cases where activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' occurs

Name: Percentage of variants containing SW-Awaiting AE Assignment that proceed to at least one SW-Reviewer Agreed activity
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Frequency of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment in comparison to SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment occurrences that belong to cases with more than three reviewer assignment attempts (e.g., multiple SW-AE Assign Reviewers)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' out of all 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Number of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment instances occurring in cases that never reach SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' does not occur

Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment events that are part of the top 5 most frequent process variants
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' out of all cases

Name: Ratio of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment occurrences leading to major revision (SW-EIC Major Revision) versus minor revision (SW-EIC Minor Revision)
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' activities for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Major Revision' occurs

Name: Frequency of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment per month to assess temporal distribution in the ACM journal review workflow
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': activity == 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment'", 'aggregation': 'total', 'group_by': 'time:timestamp'}"
